name: Good Samaritan Family Resource Center, Inc.
description: The Good Samaritan Family Resource Center’s mission is to help vulnerable families, including immigrant families, access needed services, develop self-sufficiency, and participate fully as members of the San Francisco community. GSFRC offers the following resources: - Parenting Support - Family Support - Infant and Toddler Programs - Dual Language Preschool Education - School Year Programs - Summer Camps - Newcomer Services
